name: Serengeti Migration Safari, Tanzania
description: Witness the Great Migration's river crossings and vast herds in the Serengeti.

name: Kruger Big Five Adventure, South Africa
description: Discover the Big Five and other wildlife in South Africa's premier park.

name: Okavango Delta Safari, Botswana
description: Explore the Okavango Delta waterways and encounter diverse wildlife.

name: Maasai Mara Migration, Kenya
description: Experience the dramatic Great Migration and abundant wildlife in Maasai Mara.

name: Etosha Wildlife Expedition, Namibia
description: See diverse wildlife around Etosha's salt pans and waterholes.

name: Chobe River Safari, Botswana
description: Cruise the Chobe River and witness large elephant herds and other wildlife.

name: Bwindi Gorilla Trek, Uganda
description: Trek through forests to encounter endangered mountain gorillas in Bwindi.

name: Ngorongoro Crater Safari, Tanzania
description: Explore the world's largest volcanic caldera with a high concentration of wildlife.

name: Pantanal Wildlife Expedition, Brazil
description: Navigate the world's largest tropical wetland to see jaguars and caimans.

name: Yellowstone Safari Adventure, USA
description: Discover Yellowstone's wildlife, geysers, and scenic landscapes in America's first national park.
